entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 6:28AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Periods of moderate to heavy rain continue through Tuesday afternoon for the Seward area... The wet, active, onshore flow pattern continues several fronts and disturbances will impact the northern Gulf of Alaska coast over the next 48 hours. Expect another 1 to 2 inches of rain through early Wednesday

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:36AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Areas of Wildfire Smoke With Air Quality Impacts... * Smoke from the Mosquito wildfire continues to produce unhealthy to hazardous air quality to many areas this morning.
